title: Ulaguthula Song Lyrics Kovai Brothers
stanzas:
Ulaguthula Song Lyrics Kovai Brothers
@immancomposer

Ulaguthula, nee enga
venaalum yaen
porandhirukka koodaathaa
porandhirukka koodaathaa
yaen India vula porandha

India vula nee enga
venaalum yaen
valarndhirukka koodaadhaa
valarndhirukka koodaadhaa

yaen mumbai nagarula
valarntha

Mumani nagaril nee
nirandharamaaga
irundhirukka koodaathaa

yaen chennai pattanam
vandha.

Chennai pattanam vandhaalum
enga areavula adhir
veettula yaen vandha ?

unna paarthom
udanji thoolaanom
unna paarthom
norungi noolaanom

hey pallu velakka
kayyil brush eduthaa
andha tooth brush kooda
thoorigai aachu.

un pala pala meniyil hah
thottu thavulum podhu hah
ada saadhaa soappum
sandhanam aachu

nee seevum podhu
seeppukku kooda
singappallu mulachaachu

nee vaangum podhum
aavin paalum adadaa
agmark neiyaachu

nee service poatta
tennis baalum
typhoid vandhu
stretcher aeri paduthaachu

unna paarthom
udanji thoolaanom
unna paarthom
norungi noolaanom

nee saivam endru haah
poi solla venaam hah
un kangal kulla
meengal ulladhadi

panakkaari endru hah
oru garvam venaam hah
un iduppa paarthaa
varuma theirudhadi.

nee nadakkum podhu
currenta eduthu
Neivelikku anupudilaam

nee sanju paarthaa
sarinju kedakkum
paisa kopuram nimindhidalaam

un sirippil sindhum
sillarai serthaa
india naattin motha
kadanaiyum theerthidalaam

unna paarthom
udanji thoolaanom
unna paarthom
norungi noolaanom

Ulaguthula, nee enga
venaalum yaen
porandhirukka koodaathaa
porandhirukka koodaathaa
yaen India vula porandha

India vula nee enga
venaalum yaen
valarndhirukka koodaadhaa
valarndhirukka koodaadhaa

yaen mumbai nagarula
valarntha

Mumani nagaril nee
nirandharamaaga
irundhirukka koodaathaa

yaen chennai pattanam
vandha.

Chennai pattanam vandhaalum
enga areavula adhir
veettula yaen vandha ?

unna paarthom
udanji thoolaanom
unna paarthom
norungi noolaanom
